cards.title: Anathema
setup: At the start of the game, {Anathema} enters play 'Shapeshifting Bioform' side up.
Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 2 arms, 1 Body, and 1 Head are revealed. Put those cards into play and shuffle the rest into the villain deck.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if there are no other villain targets in play, {Anathema} flips.
If there are 4 other villain targets in play, {Anathema} is immune to damage.
Whenever a villain card destroys an arm, Body, or Head, {Anathema} regains 2 HP.
cards.advanced: If there are 3 other villain targets in play, {Anathema} is immune to damage.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, if there are any other villain targets in play, {Anathema} flips.
At the end of the villain turn, each player discards a card from their hand.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the start of the villain turn, each player discards a card from their hand.
cards.challengeText: At the start of the game, put Biofeedback into play. Biofeedback is indestructible. {Anathema} is immune to villain damage.

openingLines.default: Give it up, heroes - what chance do you have against the pinnacle of evolution?
openingLines.Cauldron.TangoOneCharacter: Sniper girl! I remember you. What say we knock over a town, for old time's sake?
openingLines.GhostOpsTangoOneCharacter: Come out, come out, wherever you are!
openingLines.PastTangoOneCharacter: That gun is so last century. Today it's all about bioweapons, and you're looking at the best one there is!
openingLines.CreedOfTheSniperTangoOneCharacter: Let's play a game: It's one where I eat a bunch of second-rate heroes.

cards.title: Biofeedback
body: Whenever {Anathema} deals damage to a hero target, he regains 1 HP.
Whenever an arm, body, or head is destroyed by a hero target, {Anathema} deals himself 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Bone Cleaver
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other arm cards except the one with the highest HP.

At the end of the villain turn, {Anathema} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage. If that target took damage this way, it cannot deal damage until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: My mercenary days are long behind{BR}me. This one's free. He's got it coming.

cards.title: Carapace Helmet
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other head cards.
Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
Villain targets are immune to damage dealt by environment cards.

cards.title: Doppelganger Strike
body: The hero target with the highest HP deals the hero character with the lowest HP X toxic damage, where X is the number of villain targets in play, a hero dealt damage this way must discard {H - 2} cards.
Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: In my future, he can{BR}perfectly immitate any lifeform he{BR}comes into contact with. Be prepared.

cards.title: Enhanced Senses
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other head cards.
Change the type of all damage to sonic.
Whenever a hero card enters play, this card deals that hero character 1 sonic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Heard you primitive{BR}bioforms coming miles away!

cards.title: Explosive Transformation
body: {Anathema} deals each hero target 1 projectile damage.
Reveal the top {H} cards of the villain deck. Put the first revealed arm, body, and head into play. shuffle the remaining cards back into the villain deck.

cards.title: Heavy Carapace
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other body cards.
Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: I can increase outer{BR}biomass density all day{BR}long. What's your trick, meatsack?

cards.flavorReference: Anathema to the Scholar, Vagabond's Tale #143

cards.title: Knuckle Dragger
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other arm cards except the one with the highest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {Anathema} deals the hero character with the highest HP {H + 1} melee damage. If that hero takes damage this way, they must destroy 1 of their ongoing cards.

flavorQuotes.text: These are heavy matters to ponder.

cards.title: Metabolic Armor
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other body cards.
Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, all villain targets regain 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: The strain? Don't worry.{BR}The first thing I changed{BR}was adding a few extra hearts.

cards.title: Rampage
body: {Anathema} deals the hero with the most cards in hand {H - 1} melee damage.
Until the start of the next villain turn, increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1 and reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.

cards.title: Razor Scales
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other body cards.
The first time a villain target is dealt damage each turn, this card deals the source of that damage 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't like where this is going{BR}or how fast we're getting there.

cards.title: Reflex Booster
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other head cards.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Okay, so he's got{BR}pretty good reaction time.

cards.title: The Stuff Of Nightmares
cards.body: Whenever a villain target enters play, that target deals the hero target with the second lowest HP 2 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The most terrifying enemy{BR}is the one you cannot see.

cards.title: Thresher Claw
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other arm cards except the one with the highest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {Anathema} deals the {H - 2} heroes with the highest HP 3 toxic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: You don't understand; I{BR}volunteered for those experiments.{BR}And look what I've become!

cards.title: Whip Tendril
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other arm cards except the one with the highest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {Anathema} deals each hero target 2 projectile damage. Heroes that take damage this way must destroy 1 of their equipment cards.

flavorQuotes.text: If we make it out, I am{BR}going to find whatever lab he{BR}came from and blow it to Mars.

promoCards.title: Anathema
setup: At the start of the game, {Anathema} enters play 'Accelerated Evolution' side up. Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 2 arms, 1 Body, and 1 Head are revealed. Put those cards into play and shuffle the rest into the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever {Anathema} destroys an arm or head card, put that under {Anathema}'s villain character card.

At the end of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If an arm or head card is revealed, put it under {Anathema}'s character card, otherwise discard it. Then if there are {H} or more cards under {Anathema}, he flips.
promoCards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, {Anathema} regains {H - 2} HP.
flippedGameplay: Arm and head cards are indestructible during the villain turn.
When {Anathema} flips to this side, put all cards from underneath him into play. Shuffle all copies of explosive transformation from the villain trash into the villain deck.
When explosive transformation enters play, {Anathema} flips.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn {Anathema} regains 1 HP for each villain target in play.
challengeText: Replace both instances of arm or head card on this card with villain target.
promoCards.flippedChallengeText: Body cards are indestructible during the villain turn.

openingLines.default: I've picked up a few new tricks - and limbs. Care to see?
openingLines.Cauldron.TangoOneCharacter: I should thank you for destroying our masters; now I'm free to eat whoever I want!
openingLines.GhostOpsTangoOneCharacter: Still trying to hide? My senses have only gotten sharper!
openingLines.PastTangoOneCharacter: I keep evolving, but you're stuck in the past!
